text: Jacques Cheminade (; born 20 August 1941) is a French-Argentinian political activist and conspiracy theorist. He is the head of Solidarity and Progress, the French party of the LaRouche movement. He had ran for President of France three times in 1995, 2012 and 2017. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:French politicians Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Jacques Cheminade
